entities.name: narcissa
entities.description: Narcissa is a character who wants to enter Hogwarts and find her son. She no longer cares whether Voldemort wins.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is the main antagonist who claims Harry Potter is dead by his hand.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is a character who has been killed by Voldemort.

entities.name: hogwarts
entities.description: Hogwarts is the school where Narcissa wants to enter and find her son.

entities.name: conquering army
entities.description: The conquering army is a group that will allow Narcissa to enter Hogwarts.

relationships.description: Voldemort claims he killed Harry Potter.
